attributes.action: MPs who have broken the law in claiming expenses like mortgage payments etc,that dont exist,should be subject to a police investigation for fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any other member of the public would face a police investigation for fraud,MPs should be treated the same.
MPs Paying the money back is not good enough,they should stand down with imediate effect,have a by election and let the public choose who they want as an MP.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
